Package elki.result.outlier

Class InvertedOutlierScoreMeta

  • java.lang.Object
    • elki.result.outlier.BasicOutlierScoreMeta
      • elki.result.outlier.InvertedOutlierScoreMeta
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OutlierScoreMeta
    public class InvertedOutlierScoreMeta
extends BasicOutlierScoreMeta
    Class to signal a value-inverted outlier score, i.e. low values are outliers.
    Since:
    0.3
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
